fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack someone each night.
- Roleblock a player at night and delay them by a night. You may only use this ability thrice.
**Insatiable Indifference** â€” Delay all players targetting you by two nights and all other players except you by one night. You may only use this ability once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When someone is delayed, for the rest of the game, every action they take will resolve the night after instead. They will not know they have been delayed.
- Whenever someone targets you, they're delayed by one night.
- You may multitask.
